attributes.action: Keir Starmer to immediately resign and a general election to be held
attributes.additional_details:
False promises and lies told to the British people.

We have a government we can not trust
attributes.background: Remove the current incumbents and call a general election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
